TopicTitle: How do you mount things like the Cart Buggy vertically to the side of ur rocket?

Articles.Content:
Quick question - I\'ve seen a number of people mount the cart frame (Carts Mod here --> http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=8431.0 ) to the side of their rocket so the cart sits vertically on one side.

For the life of me I can not figure out how to do this. Is there a different mod needed to achieve this?

Thank you for any info!
You can just throw it on like a radial decoupler, just make sure theres enough space for the whole cart.

Aaaaaand I\'m retarded, did not make rocket long enough ???

Thank you!
